desc: 공격 시 낮은 확률로 랜덤 상태이상 부여

dictionary.lore: The gods put sinners in a prison of torture, where this weapon was carried by its guards to execute condemnation. Not much else is known about these guards, but this tool for condemnation was reforged by a human blacksmith. The special shape of the spearhead causes anyone struck by it to suffer every type of pain imaginable, making it an example of a torture device in the human world.

name: 흉극 게헤나베룸
